channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 16:17 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟠 16:17 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 16:16 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.

item.title: 🟡 16:11 Failure to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapets Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 16:11 Failure to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapets Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
